LABEL: Label
REMOVE_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to delete the menu item '{{ title }}'?
OPEN_CONFIRMATION: Are you sure you want to open '{{ title }}' in a new tab?
ITEM_ALREADY_LOCKED: You cannot edit this menu because '{{ lockedBy }}' is already editing it
ITEM_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE: The menu item '{{ item }}' already exists in the sub menu '{{ parentPath }}'
ITEM_NAME_NOT_UNIQUE_IN_ROOT: The menu item '{{ item }}' already exists as a top menu item
INVALID_CHARACTERS: The following characters are not allowed in the label: {{ invalidCharacters }}
CLOSE_PANEL_TITLE: Are you sure you want to close this panel?
CLOSE_PANEL_CONFIRMATION: The latest changes will be discarded.
